name: BladeWings
description:
PLAY TIME: 1 HOUR

PROLOGUE

THE STARS. THE GALAXIES. THE IMMENSE DEPTH OF THE UNIVERSE.

IT HAS ALWAYS BEEN YOUR DREAM TO BECOME A PILOT OF THE SPACE ARMY: THE BLADEWINGS. BUT TO ACHIEVE THIS YOU WILL HAVE TO PASS THEIR INTENSE TRAINING PROGRAM.

ARE YOU READY ?

HOW TO PLAY LEFT HANDED CONTROLS RIGHT HANDED CONTROLS Left arrow - Right arrow A - D move Up arrow - Down arrow W - S propeller C B shoot X N shield Z M special weapon P P pause CREDITS

Developed by LYL Games

Music: AudioJungle

Sounds: ZapSplat
